headline: Axon Enterprise (AXON) Beats Stock Market Upswing: What Investors Need to Know
summary: The latest trading day saw Axon Enterprise (AXON) settling at $720.53, representing a +1.29% change from its previous close.

headline: Axon (AXON): Reassessing Valuation Following Launch of Compact Body Camera for Frontline Worker Safety
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) has launched the Axon Body Workforce Mini, a body camera built for retail, healthcare, and other frontline sectors where incidents of workplace violence and theft have been rising. The device, debuting in 2026, is 25% smaller and lighter than existing models and includes features tailored for everyday worker safety. See our latest analysis for Axon Enterprise. Axon's expansion into frontline worker safety comes as the company builds on its reputation for innovation and...
